func.title: CreateParticle

param.name: x
param.desc: X-coordinate of the new particle (relative to object for local calls).

param.name: y
param.desc: Y-coordinate of the new particle (relative to object for local calls).

param.name: speed_x
param.desc: Starting speed of the particle in x-direction. Can also be a value provider function.

param.name: speed_y
param.desc: Starting speed of the particle in y-direction. Can also be a value provider function.

param.name: lifetime
param.desc: Time in frames that the particle will be alive before it is removed. Can also be a value provider function. If set to 0, the particle will not be removed automatically.

param.name: properties
param.desc: PropList with the particle attributes (see the particle documentation).

param.name: amount
param.desc: Amount of particles to create. Defaults to 1.

func.desc: Creates a new particle with the given properties. Note that particle creation is not necessarily synchronized over the network and thus, the return value is not whether the particle was actually created but whether the particle definition was found.
func.remark: See the particle documentation for further explanations.

example.text: Casts 100 particles with a previously defined behavior.
